content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Jane Zhang

| customs =
}}
Jane Zhang (; born October 11, 1984), is a Chinese singer-songwriter. She is one of the Chinese's leading contemporary recording artists. Known for her signature whistle register, she was dubbed the "Dolphin Princess".
